website_summaries.verdict: Affordable, made with pure, high-quality fish oil, and a solution for those who don’t do well with large pills, this soft gel supplement is the least0fishy way to reap its health benefits.
pros: Minimal heavy metal, mercury, and PCBs
cons: You trade potency for a reduced softgel size with this supplement

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't describe them as mini sized
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because they are described as "mini" in size for my husband who had esophageal surgery, which can cause him problems swallowing solid items like larger pills. I guess what we and they call "mini" are 2 different things. He can't swallow these and even I feel like there's a lump in my throat after taking one. The one good thing was no fishy taste after taking it.
customer_reviews.author: Robi

customer_reviews.title: These are in fact Mini
customer_reviews.text: I am reading complaints about how these softgels are NOT MINI. Well folks they absolutely ARE MINI Soft gels. I am posting a photo of my previous Fish Oil softgel next to this one from GNC. Also, there is no fishy taste during or after taking them.
customer_reviews.author: jeff johansen

customer_reviews.title: Great value & No snake oil .
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite fishoil for no fishy taste/ after taste . For the price this is a really good value and you know theyre not lying about the Mg content like a lot of companies do . Just a straight forward fish oil supplement that tells it like it is ,with lab testing .
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Not so mini!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these because the typical fish oil pills are so large and hard to swallow. These are not as long, BUT they are wider in diameter which is worse. Additionally they have a non-slippery/rough outside, so they don't slide down easily. Always feels like it gets stuck ar first while the typical longer pills at least they slide down more easily if they have the smooth coating.
customer_reviews.author: J. O'keefe

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted in a fish oil supplement
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted at better than fair price. These are the mini supplements with just right dose as recommended by doctor and are premium brand. No fish burps no after taste and 1000mg total. Easy on stomach. Will purchase again from reputable company!
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Not Mini
customer_reviews.text: Call these "smaller than the normal size" but please dont call them mini! Can't even swallow these things. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: James Asprinio

customer_reviews.title: The benefits outweigh the hard to swallow issues
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to swallow. I have the mini capsules, but it still is hard to swallow.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewed It

customer_reviews.title: Small. Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: I like that they are small and easy to swallow. I would much rather take more pills but I have trouble swallowing the large once They are mercury free and enteric-coated so no fishy taste. Price is reasonable
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product for few bottles from GNC store. I found out more convenience and same price( or cheaper) from here sometimes.

customer_reviews.title: My labs improved so much!
customer_reviews.text: I love these...I take 4 of them 2 times a day and my numbers are fantastic

customer_reviews.title: Benefits with out the horse-pill size
customer_reviews.text: We like the benefits of vitamins but fish oil is typically a huge pill, these are sized just right

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact that the softgels are mini size and not horse pills.

customer_reviews.title: Wrong softgels mailed
customer_reviews.text: The wrong Fish oil softgels were mailed to me. There was a label attached to the bottle saying mini softgels, but the softgels in the bottle are regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fishy burps
customer_reviews.text: Enteric coated to prevent fishy burps. Not effective. Worse fish burps ever.

customer_reviews.title: thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand bc there is no fishy taste or after taste!

customer_reviews.title: GNC Triple Strength Fish oil Mini,120 Mini Softgels
customer_reviews.text: These fish oil supplements work wonders for my joints.These also help me with my energy levels.You won't notice an improvement right away.These supplements take time.I am happy that i made this purchase.Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Product contains soy
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize the product contained soy until after it arrived. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this fish oil for years with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: TAW

customer_reviews.title: I Will keep buying this product
customer_reviews.text: Finally a good fish pill that isn't hard to swallow !
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Had a different GNC formula similar to this. Use it mainly for cognitive function as I suffer from seizures on occasion. No burps, no upset stomach, gives me great shine to hair and nails. Will buy again and again
customer_reviews.author: FireTyrant

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with the product. I will purchase again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: David Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Fish oil is good for all things.
customer_reviews.text: The pills are small so they are easy to take.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the bottle looks old and the font printed on the label do not look well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: Excellent product, especially for those with glaucoma & dry eye, but capsules too large
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: It was recommended by my glaucoma specialist at New York Presbyterian/Weill Cornell hospital's faculty practice as a replacement for the drops Restasis, used for dry eye. To be accompanied by a product like Optiva a few times a day or as needed. I no longer have dry eye, and also have the benefit of very large dose purified fish oil from GNC. Two caps daily. HOWEVER! these capsules are too round in shape, and they have become very difficult for me to swallow. I am prone to dysphagia. The shape of the capsules should not be so round, it should be more of a traditional capsule in shape, or the dose should be 3 capsules. Be careful with these.
customer_reviews.author: DanCooperMedia

customer_reviews.title: "MINI" IS INACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the size. These are not mini compared to the Omega-3 PEARLS from NatureMade. Even our dogs did not want to eat the GNC triple strength fish oil mini soft gels. Purchase the NatureMade Omega-3 PEARLS if you want an easy to swallow fish oil capsule.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.G.B. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to swallow
customer_reviews.text: Fish oil pills have been hit or miss for me. These have been my favorite so far though! They're easy to swallow. I don't feel a lump in my throat after taking them like I do with some larger pills. I take them right before I eat, and I haven't had any problems with upset stomach or heartburn. I can't eat much due to surgery, so I take one pill before lunch and one pill before dinner, and that works perfectly for me. Absolutely no fishy aftertaste and no burps. I will keep buying these!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THESE.. Dull finish, can’t swallow!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! I can swallow large pills and 5 or 6 at one time. These get stuck in my throat!! The surface is a dull finish..seriously who would think that surface would slide down a throat. Unbelievable. I wasn’t ready for them til June 2 and I see that my final return date WAS May 31. No more GNC
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer DG

customer_reviews.title: Throat Chokers
customer_reviews.text: Horrible to swallow, my wife and I are usually fine with pills and with our normal sized fish oil pills are okay but these really get stuck in your throat. Quite unpleasant! The outer coating is rough, maybe that's why? They don't SEEM that big.
customer_reviews.author: T. Laux

customer_reviews.title: Great for Triglycerides
customer_reviews.text: Been using these for years and they do help with my triglyceride number. It dropped in half when I started using them and has stayed down. Don't seem to do a thing for my total cholesterol.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Two a day
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these, and although I can't tell much difference in how I feel, I'm sure they are good for me from all I have read. No aftertaste. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: J. S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: good value overall
customer_reviews.text: these are a good value. two softgels supply a lot of omega 3. maybe a bit harder to swallow than some mini fish oil softgels. overall I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Eric P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't work !
customer_reviews.text: I really hadn't seen a difference in my energy. I'm going to try something different. If I could send it back I would.
customer_reviews.author: BEV

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones you want!
customer_reviews.text: My hair is coming in thicker which I desperately need and my crepey skin is much improved. And I only take one a day though I did start with 2. No fishy aftertaste or burps!
customer_reviews.author: Rosetta White

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: These are a really nice size for fish oil pills. They do have a slight fishy aftertaste, but it doesn't last too long. Overall I'm pretty satisfied with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jhyphen

customer_reviews.title: Still a Fishy Aftertaste.
customer_reviews.text: It’s pricey compare to what out there. This product sometime still have a fishy aftertaste. Then again is 1000mg of EPA/DHA.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, small
customer_reviews.text: Rated high, one only needed for dosage, easy to swallow, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it really helps with joint pain. I can def tell if I miss a day!
customer_reviews.author: Arecia

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. Not as good as GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil 1400 + Brain Support. too sad, could not find those anymore.

customer_reviews.title: Confused, but content.
customer_reviews.text: Looked all over for this. They changed the mg so it made it difficult to match what I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: size is perfect, I cannot take larger gel aps or pills
customer_reviews.author: JillAlice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great source of Omega 3, my eyesight has improved since taking this.

product_meta.title: GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil Mini,120 Mini Softgels
feature_bullets: TRIPLE STRENGTH OMEGA-3 FISH OIL: GNC Triple Strength Fish Oil Mini delivers 1000mg EPA & DHA Omega-3s with just two daily mini softgels for joint, heart, skin, brain and eye health.

WHAT ARE OMEGA-3S?: Omega-3s are fatty acids that play an important role in your body. They include EPA and DHA, which is found in fish oil. Your body doesn’t produce sufficient amounts of these essential fatty acids on its own so they need to be obtained through diet or a supplement.

BENEFITS OF TRIPLE STRENGTH FISH OIL: Fish oil supports the body’s natural anti-inflammatory response and is necessary for cardiovascular health.^ It helps to support normal blood pressure already within normal ranges and normal, healthy triglyceride levels. Fish oil also helps maintain normal healthy cognitive and nervous system health.
HIGH-QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Sourced from wild, deep ocean fish including anchovy, mackerel, sardine, smelt, tuna and cod, and enteric coated to help control fishy burps.

BACKED BY SCIENCE: Since 1935, GNC has been committed to meeting the highest standards of quality, safety and efficacy while applying the most up-to-date advances in nutritional science so you can live well.
